--- David Thielen <dthielen@...> wrote:
> Hi;
> 
> Asking again in the hope that someone has a good solution for this.
> 
> thanks - dave
> 

Is simply use JUnit with a combination of mock and real objects.  

You can also use JUnitEE as a way to put the tests within the context
of the servlet container.

There are also some commercial tools, such as EJBTest, if you're in the
market for such tools.

Mike
